mapper.delete: delete from PM_UpLevelProject where projectid = #{projectid, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into PM_UpLevelProject (ProjectID, SubjectName, ManageOrganization, Manager, Funds, SubjectType) values ( #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subjectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageorganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funds,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subjecttype,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update PM_UpLevelProject set ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SubjectName = #{subjectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ManageOrganization = #{manageorganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Funds = #{funds,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SubjectType = #{subjecttype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where InfoID = #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select InfoID, ProjectID, SubjectName, ManageOrganization, Manager, Funds, SubjectType from PM_UpLevelProject
